mapper.insert: insert into lg_shipper (shipperId, shipperName, phone, address, gender, idCard, bankTransferAccount, bankDeposit, contractServiceContent, contractNumber, contractStartingDate, contractEndDate, email, loadingContact, loadingAddress, loadingPhone, logisticsRates, shipperType, contractStatus, contractSettlementDate, receivableLiablePerson, salesMan, remarks, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{shipperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shippername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banktransferaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankdeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractservicecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractstartingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{contractenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadingcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadingphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsrates,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shippertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractsettlementdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{receivableliableperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_shipper set shipperName = #{shippername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankTransferAccount = #{banktransferaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankDeposit = #{bankdeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractServiceContent = #{contractservicecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractNumber = #{contractnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractStartingDate = #{contractstartingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, contractEndDate = #{contractenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loadingContact = #{loadingcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loadingAddress = #{loadingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loadingPhone = #{loadingphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticsRates = #{logisticsrates,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shipperType = #{shippertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contractStatus = #{contractstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contractSettlementDate = #{contractsettlementdate,jdbcType=DATE}, receivableLiablePerson = #{receivableliableperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salesMan = #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shipperId = #{shipperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shipperId, shipperName, phone, address, gender, idCard, bankTransferAccount, bankDeposit, contractServiceContent, contractNumber, contractStartingDate, contractEndDate, email, loadingContact, loadingAddress, loadingPhone, logisticsRates, shipperType, contractStatus, contractSettlementDate, receivableLiablePerson, salesMan, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_shipper where shipperId = #{shipperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select shipperId, shipperName, phone, address, gender, idCard, bankTransferAccount, bankDeposit, contractServiceContent, contractNumber, contractStartingDate, contractEndDate, email, loadingContact, loadingAddress, loadingPhone, logisticsRates, shipperType, contractStatus, contractSettlementDate, receivableLiablePerson, salesMan, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_shipper
